DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluating the safety and pharmacokinetics of multiple oral doses of an investigational oral diabetic agent when given to healthy Japanese male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Multiple Oral Doses of PPM-204 in Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Men, aged 20 to 45 years, inclusive Body mass index in the range of 17.6 to 26.4 kg/m2 Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12lead electrocardiogram (ECG) History of cardiac, thyroid, muscle, and kidney abnormalities History of NSAID induced bronchospasm or asthma History of any clinically important allergies
